solution_line_template: The multiple-choice questions will take her a total of {num_multiple_choice_questions} * {time_per_mc_question} = <<{num_multiple_choice_questions}*{time_per_mc_question}={total_mc_minutes}>>{total_mc_minutes} minutes.

The fill-in-the-blank questions will take her a total of {time_per_fib_question} * {num_fib_questions} = <<{time_per_fib_question}*{num_fib_questions}={total_fib_minutes}>>{total_fib_minutes} minutes.
The test will take her a total of {total_mc_minutes} + {total_fib_minutes} = <<{total_mc_minutes}+{total_fib_minutes}={total_study_minutes}>>{total_study_minutes} minutes to study for.
Therefore, Martiza will need to study a total of {total_study_minutes} / {minutes_per_hour} minutes = <<{total_study_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_study_hours}>>{total_study_hours} hours.
